## Discussion

This method starts the installation process. The VM must be in a stopped state. During the installation operation, pausing or stopping the VM results in an undefined behavior.

If you start the installation on the same [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacOSInstaller] object more than once, the framework raises an exception.

Call this method only on the VM’s queue.

# install()

**Instance Method**

Start installing macOS.

## Declaration

```swift
func install() async throws
```

## Discussion

This method starts the installation process. The VM must be in a stopped state. During the installation operation, pausing or stopping the VM results in an undefined behavior.

If you start the installation on the same [doc://com.apple.virtualization/documentation/Virtualization/VZMacOSInstaller] object more than once, the framework raises an exception.

Call this method only on the VM’s queue.

## Installing macOS

- **install(completionHandler:)**: Start installing macOS.
title: install()
